name: code-narrator
description: Uses OpenAI to generate documentation on code and tests. A friend to the lazy developer. It is self documenting tool and should be validation of the documentation working, similar to a compiler compiling it self.. Use code-narrator.json file to set the project, documentation and test paths
author: Ingi Gauti Ragnarsson @ingig

scripts.start:comment: To start the application run 'npm run start'
